## direction variable

Computes direction vector `a` -<!-- -->&gt; `b`<!-- -->, normalized to length `n` (default 1).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
direction: (out: Vec | null, a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, n?: number) => Vec
```
